# updateQuickLookPreviewPanel()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the QuickLook panel that an update may be required.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateQuickLookPreviewPanel()
```

## Discussion

Notifies the  [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanel] class for possible status changes with the data source or controller.  Typically invoked in response to selection changes.

## Supporting QuickLook

- **toggleQuickLookPreviewPanel(_:)**: An action message that toggles the visibility state of the Quick Look preview panel.
- **quickLookPreviewableItems(inRanges:)**: Returns an array of URLs for items that can be displayed by QuickLook in the specified ranges.
